resources.string: The conversion result from %1$s %2$s to %3$s is %4$s

This Conversion App is developed as an educational tool to help users convert values between units such as temperature, length, and weight.
The temperature conversion feature allows you to convert values between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin quickly and accurately.
The app is designed with a simple and user-friendly interface, making it suitable for students, teachers, and the general public.
Developed by Faris Rizky Ramadhan as part of a mobile programming learning project.
Copyright protected © 2025.

This Conversion App provides a length unit conversion feature to help users calculate values between units such as millimeter, centimeter, meter, kilometer, inch, feet, and mile.
The length conversion feature is designed to be easy to use and delivers accurate results in no time.
This app is very useful for students, engineers, and anyone who needs a practical length measurement tool.
Developed by Faris Rizky Ramadhan as part of a mobile programming learning project.
Copyright © 2025. All rights reserved.

This Conversion App also supports weight unit conversion to help users calculate values between units such as milligram, gram, kilogram, ton, ounce, and pound.
The weight conversion feature is designed with an intuitive interface and quickly displays conversion results.
It is ideal for use in learning activities, cooking, logistics, or any other activity involving weight units.
Developed by Faris Rizky Ramadhan as part of a mobile programming learning project.
Copyright © 2025.
